column1: Create a high-end commercial video; automatically analyze the uploaded product image to identify the exact product type and ideal use-case; feature a beautiful Thai-Japanese female model with fair skin, long ponytail, and dimples whose face and body must match the provided reference image exactly; she naturally demonstrates the analyzed product while speaking directly to the camera with perfect lip-sync in fluent Bangkok Thai; auto-generate a full commercial script that fits within 10 seconds or less (hook ? problem ? transformation ? call-to-action) without exceeding the time; tone bright, confident, persuasive; 4K photorealistic studio cinematography with clean background, no text or graphics; maintain the product’s exact real-world shape, size, texture, and design from the uploaded image.
